CorrectionPage.block1: For professionals and private individuals alike!
CorrectionPage.block2: ALL OF THEM! We often think that proofreading is for correcting novels, plays, manuscripts or articles.
CorrectionPage.block3: In fact, any document containing words can be corrected: communication materials, company documents, CVs, covering letters, etc.
CorrectionPage.block4: Contact me to discuss your project!

formula2.name: Rigorous correction
formula2.desc: The professional touch your creations deserve.

InterpretariatPage.title1: Need an interpreter in France or abroad?
InterpretariatPage.block4: I'd be delighted to accompany you for all your events! I can travel anywhere in France and abroad, depending on my availability. Outside Nantes, the cost of travel will be added to the price of the service chosen.
InterpretariatPage.block5: Call on me for your business or personal events!
InterpretariatPage.title2: What kinds of interpretations are possible?
InterpretariatPage.block6: I propose two types of interpretation:
InterpretariatPage.block7: consecutive interpretation: I speak after the speaker. The speaker's speech is fragmented. Interpreting only goes in one direction, English > French or Spanish > French.
InterpretariatPage.block8: bilateral interpreting: this is used during a discussion. I speak after the person but interpret in both directions, English <> French or Spanish <> French.
InterpretariatPage.block9: I don't (yet) do simultaneous or whispered interpreting.

formula1.name: By the hour
formula1.desc: For an event between 1 and 3 hours.

formula2.name: Half day
formula2.desc: For an event lasting between 3 and 5 hours.

formula3.name: By the day
formula3.desc: For an event between 5 and 8 hours*.

WhoAmIPage.block1: My name is Jeanne and I love words, in any language for that matter.
WhoAmIPage.block2: After a baccalauréat in literature and a degree in foreign languages and cultures in English and Spanish, I embarked on an international master's degree focusing on health, art and culture.
WhoAmIPage.block3: During my internships, I had the chance to work as an interpreter for the Armadillo association in France and Guatemala, where I stayed for two months. I was also an intern for Médecins du Monde as a medical interpreter for asylum seekers in Croatia. These experiences convinced me that I was cut out for this job.
WhoAmIPage.block4: At the same time as my Master's degree, I also started training to become a proofreader at the École Française de Lecteur-Correcteur. My passion for words and my hard work have enabled me to achieve expert level thanks to a score of 947 / 1,000 in the Voltaire Certificate.
WhoAmIPage.block5: This Prosae adventure will allow me to help you as a professional interpreter and proofreader, two things I'm passionate about. I can't wait to see what you come up with!

ContactPage.title1: How do I get in touch?
ContactPage.block1: I am at your disposal by email, telephone or on social networks via Instagram and LinkedIn. We can also meet up if you live in the Nantes region, or have a video chat!
ContactPage.block2: I can be reached on Instagram, LinkedIn, by email, by phone or via this contact form!
